_header: Gods Son passing from place supernal
Subjects: hymns, to Christ; Christ, hymns to
_description: The hymn ‘Verbum supernum supernis’ — four stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Goddys sone passyng frome place supernallOnly goten to god fadyr in
                    blys…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…In blys aboue þer os þi mercy shynysAccompanyd
                    whyth hevenly Citizines
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             The Middle English Penitential Lyric.
Columbia University Studies in English.
         New York: Columbia Press, 1911: 7-8.
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “Hymnal from MS. Additional 34193, British Museum.”

            Roger Sherman Loomis, ed. 
         New York: Columbia UP, 1927: 443-88: 447-8.
